column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Impressionism is my absolute favorite art form.  Impressionists
column3: Renoir and van Gogh are my absolute favorites
column4: and here each is wonderfully represented in the permanent collection.  There are lots of others
column6: including Seurat with his most famous 'Sunday on La Grand Jatte
column9: and a number of others - including Manet and Toulouse Lautrec.  I'd have been delighted with my visit here if these had been the only objects d'art on display - but wow
column10: was there ever a lot more to see!
